headline: Stock Market Today, Feb. 19: American Airlines Falls as Rising Fuel Costs Test 2026 Earnings Outlook
summary: American Airlines shares declined as crude oil prices remained near six-month highs, negatively affecting airline stocks throughout the sector. Investors are evaluating whether persistently elevated fuel costs could hinder the company’s ability to achieve its 2026 earnings target.

headline: United Airlines rewards program, Coors-maker's weak outlook
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Molson Coors (TAP) stock is falling after the company provided full-year revenue guidance that disappointed Wall Street. United Airlines (UAL) is shaking up its rewards program, offering Mileage Plus cardholders up to twice as many miles per dollar for flights as non-cardholders. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: United Airlines Shakes Up Loyalty Program to Favor Cardholders
summary: Earning miles without a United Airlines credit or debit card is set to become a slower grind.  Starting April 2, United Airlines cardholders will be able to earn up to twice as many miles per dollar spent on flights compared with non-cardholders.  Non-cardholders will no longer be able to earn miles when they book basic economy, United said Thursday.

raw.headline: United Airlines Shakes Up Loyalty Program to Favor Cardholders
raw.summary: Earning miles without a United Airlines credit or debit card is set to become a slower grind.  Starting April 2, United Airlines cardholders will be able to earn up to twice as many miles per dollar spent on flights compared with non-cardholders.  Non-cardholders will no longer be able to earn miles when they book basic economy, United said Thursday.

headline: United Gives MileagePlus Credit Cardholders More Miles, Exclusive Flight Discounts
summary: United Airlines is giving travelers three new reasons to hold and use a United MileagePlus® credit or debit card: the ability to earn up to twice as many miles as non-cardholders, at least 10% off United award tickets and access to special inventory of its lowest-priced award seats.

raw.headline: United Gives MileagePlus Credit Cardholders More Miles, Exclusive Flight Discounts

headline: United Airlines overhauls MileagePlus program — here's what to know
summary: Earning airline frequent flyer miles is getting harder and more expensive. United Airlines is the latest to be making big changes to its MileagePlus frequent flyer program. The airline will give more rewards to customers that have one of the carrier’s co-branded credit cards over those without one. The changes mark the biggest shakeup to the lucrative program in more than a decade.

raw.headline: United Airlines overhauls MileagePlus program — here's what to know
raw.summary: Earning airline frequent flyer miles is getting harder and more expensive. United Airlines is the latest to be making big changes to its MileagePlus frequent flyer program. The airline will give more rewards to customers that have one of the carrier’s co-branded credit cards over those without one. The changes mark the biggest shakeup to the lucrative program in more than a decade.

headline: United Airlines is paring back rewards for travelers who don't have its credit card in MileagePlus overhaul
summary: United Airlines is overhauling its MileagePlus loyalty program to reward customers who have the carrier's credit card over those without it.

raw.headline: United Airlines is paring back rewards for travelers who don't have its credit card in MileagePlus overhaul
raw.summary: United Airlines is overhauling its MileagePlus loyalty program to reward customers who have the carrier's credit card over those without it.
